title: TSSR: A Truncated and Signed Square Root Activation Function for Neural Networks. (arXiv:2308.04832v1 [cs.CV])
abstract: Activation functions are essential components of neural networks. In this paper, we introduce a new activation function called the Truncated and Signed Square Root (TSSR) function. This function is distinctive because it is odd, nonlinear, monotone and differentiable. Its gradient is continuous and always positive. Thanks to these properties, it has the potential to improve the numerical stability of neural networks. Several experiments confirm that the proposed TSSR has better performance than other stat-of-the-art activation functions. The proposed function has significant implications for the development of neural network models and can be applied to a wide range of applications in fields such as computer vision, natural language processing, and speech recognition.

translated_title: TSSR：一种截断和带符号的平方根激活函数用于神经网络
translated_abstract: 激活函数是神经网络的重要组成部分。本文介绍了一种新的激活函数，称为截断和带符号平方根（TSSR）函数。该函数具有奇数、非线性、单调和可微分的特性。其梯度是连续且始终为正。由于这些特性，它有潜力改善神经网络的数值稳定性。多个实验证实了所提出的TSSR比其他最先进的激活函数具有更好的性能。该函数对神经网络模型的发展具有重要意义，并可应用于计算机视觉、自然语言处理和语音识别等领域的广泛应用。
tldr: 本文介绍了一种新的激活函数 TSSR，具有奇数、非线性、单调和可微分的特性。实验证实了TSSR相比其他激活函数具有更好的性能，对神经网络模型的发展具有重要意义，并适用于多个领域的广泛应用。
en_tdlr: This paper introduces a new activation function called TSSR, which has the properties of being odd, nonlinear, monotone, and differentiable. Experimental results show that TSSR outperforms other activation functions and has significant implications for the development of neural network models, making it applicable to various fields.
